prompt: <description>**CAD Modeling Instructions:** **Part 1:** Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Create a new sketch on the XY plane of the coordinate system. Draw a rectangle using four lines: * Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.0] * Line 2: Start Point [0.75, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.25] * Line 3: Start Point [0.75, 0.25], End Point [0.0, 0.25] * Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.25], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the given euler angles and translation vector. Extrude the 3D sketch to generate the 3D model with the following properties: * Extrude depth towards normal: 0.0 * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.375 * Sketch scale: 0.75 * Operation: Create a new solid body **Part 2:** Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.125] Create a new sketch on the XY plane of the coordinate system. Draw a rectangle using four lines: * Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.1562, 0.0] * Line 2: Start Point [0.1562, 0.0], End Point [0.1562, 0.125] * Line 3: Start Point [0.1562, 0.125], End Point [0.0, 0.125] * Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.125], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.1562. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the given euler angles and translation vector. Extrude the 3D sketch to remove material (subtract) from the previous solid body with the following properties: * Extrude depth towards normal: 0.0 * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.375 * Sketch scale: 0.1562 * Operation: Remove material **Part 3:** Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.5938, 0.0, 0.125] Create a new sketch on the XY plane of the coordinate system. Draw a rectangle using four lines: * Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.1562, 0.0] * Line 2: Start Point [0.1562, 0.0], End Point [0.1562, 0.125] * Line 3: Start Point [0.1562, 0.125], End Point [0.0, 0.125] * Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.125], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Scale the sketch by a factor</description>
